creative.name: Creative Profile
creative.description: You are attracted to innovation, art and creation. You like to express your ideas and work on original projects.

technical.name: Technical Profile
technical.description: You excel at solving complex problems, logic and technology. You are methodical and precise.

social.name: Social Profile
social.description: You have a strong interest in helping others, communicating and working in teams. You are empathetic and a good listener.

organizational.name: Organizational Profile
organizational.description: You are organized, like to manage projects and lead teams. You have a sense of responsibility.

entrepreneurial.name: Entrepreneurial Profile
entrepreneurial.description: You are independent, like to take calculated risks and create your own path. You are visionary.

step2.title: CV Title and Profile
step2.description: Define your CV title and catchy message

step3.title: Diploma Education
step3.description: Your state or school diplomas listed from most recent to oldest

step5.title: Professional Experience
step5.description: Internships (PFE, observation, technical) and first jobs/fixed-term contracts

step7.title: Technical Skills (Hard Skills)
step7.description: Specific knowledge related to your profession

step8.title: IT Skills
step8.description: Mastery of office software and business tools

step10.title: Language Skills
step10.description: Proficiency levels in Arabic, French and English

form.linkedin_hint: 2025 Tip: Make sure your LinkedIn link is personalized (without unnecessary numbers at the end)
form.photo_advice: Format: Front-facing portrait, neutral background, professional attire. In Morocco, photos are still commonly used to humanize the profile.
form.cvTitle_hint: The exact title of the position you're targeting or your flagship diploma. Ex: "EMI Graduate ‚Äì State Engineer in Civil Engineering"
form.cvTitle_placeholder: Ex: EMI Graduate ‚Äì State Engineer in Civil Engineering
form.profile_hint: A 3-4 line paragraph summarizing your education, major expertise and added value.
form.profile_placeholder: Ex: Young ENCG graduate passionate about data analysis, with first experience in audit at [Company X]. Results-oriented and ready to join your finance teams.
form.no_diploma: No diploma added. Click "Add Diploma" to start.
form.diploma_name_placeholder: Ex: State Engineer in Civil Engineering
form.mention_placeholder: Ex: Good, Fairly Good, Very Good
form.pfe_subject_placeholder: Ex: Design of a management system...
form.no_experience: No experience added. Click "Add Experience" to start.
form.projects_hint: Hackathons, entrepreneurship competitions (Enactus, Injaz), technical challenges. Indicate your role and ranking obtained.
form.associations_hint: Involvement in school clubs or NGOs. This demonstrates your citizenship spirit and human values.
form.custom_skills_hint: Add skills specific to your field (ex: Moroccan accounting standards, structure calculation, labor law)
form.custom_it_skills_hint: Add software or tools specific to your field
form.interests_placeholder:
Ex: Running - Participation in Casablanca Marathon 2024
Thematic Reading - Interest in entrepreneurial literature
Travel - Exploration of 15 countries in Europe and Africa
form.objective_placeholder: Ex: I wish to join a dynamic company in the digital marketing field where I can use my communication skills and creativity...
